about_the_game:
Make voxel fun thanks to Cubzh!

Cubzh is the perfect opportunity to play around with cubes to build worlds of your own and mini-games. Unleash your creativity and share your creations with others!

Features


Here is what’s in store to enjoy Cubzh:
  • Creating and editing your own world made out of cubes
  • Creating individual items that you can freely edit and share with others
  • Share your mini-games so everybody can have fun with it
  • Take part in the community to share your knowledge, skills and promote them!



If voxel is something you have considered learning your whole life, Cubzh is where you can start to assimilate them easily with fun. For LUA coder enthusiasts, there’s a room for you too! Thanks to the power of community, you’ll be able to progress by connecting with others. You’ll learn at your own pace and easily. Go for it and show us your skills!

Thanks to the power of community, you’ll be able to progress by connecting with others. You’ll learn at your own pace and easily. Go for it and show us your skills!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 15.1
  • Processor: Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Cubzh (Open Alpha)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Make your own items and worlds, share them, hang out and play with your friends. Enter a world made out of cubes where creativity has no limit!
